00024     EventDisplay::EventDisplay() : TGMainFrame(gClient->GetRoot(), 1000, 600) {
00025 
00026         TEveElement* ecal = drawECAL();
00027         TEveElement* recoilTracker = drawRecoilTracker();
00028 
00029         detector_->AddElement(ecal);
00030         detector_->AddElement(recoilTracker);
00031 
00032         gEve->AddElement(detector_);
00033         gEve->Redraw3D(kTRUE);
00034 
00035         //SetCleanup(kDeepCleanup);
00036 
00037         TGVerticalFrame* contents = new TGVerticalFrame(this, 100,200);
00038         TGHorizontalFrame* commandFrame1 = new TGHorizontalFrame(contents, 100,0);
00039         TGHorizontalFrame* commandFrame2 = new TGHorizontalFrame(contents, 100,0);
00040         TGHorizontalFrame* commandFrame3 = new TGHorizontalFrame(contents, 100,0);
00041 
00042         TGButton* buttonClose = new TGTextButton(commandFrame3, "&Exit", "gApplication->Terminate(0)");
00043         commandFrame3->AddFrame(buttonClose, new TGLayoutHints(kLHintsExpandX));
00044 
00045         TGButton* buttonPrevious = new TGTextButton(commandFrame2, "Previous Event");
00046         commandFrame2->AddFrame(buttonPrevious, new TGLayoutHints(kLHintsExpandX));
00047         buttonPrevious->Connect("Pressed()", "ldmx::EventDisplay", this, "PreviousEvent()");
00048 
00049         TGButton* buttonNext = new TGTextButton(commandFrame2, "Next Event");
00050         commandFrame2->AddFrame(buttonNext, new TGLayoutHints(kLHintsExpandX));
00051         buttonNext->Connect("Pressed()", "ldmx::EventDisplay", this, "NextEvent()");
00052 
00053         textBox_ = new TGTextEntry(commandFrame1, new TGTextBuffer(100));
00054         commandFrame1->AddFrame(textBox_, new TGLayoutHints(kLHintsExpandX));
00055 
00056         TGButton* buttonGoTo = new TGTextButton(commandFrame1, "Go to Event");
00057         commandFrame1->AddFrame(buttonGoTo, new TGLayoutHints(kLHintsExpandX));
00058         buttonGoTo->Connect("Pressed()", "ldmx::EventDisplay", this, "GotoEvent()");
00059 
00060         contents->AddFrame(commandFrame1, new TGLayoutHints(kLHintsExpandX | kLHintsExpandY));
00061         contents->AddFrame(commandFrame2, new TGLayoutHints(kLHintsExpandX | kLHintsExpandY));
00062         contents->AddFrame(commandFrame3, new TGLayoutHints(kLHintsExpandX | kLHintsExpandY));
00063 
00064         AddFrame(contents, new TGLayoutHints(kLHintsExpandX | kLHintsExpandY));
00065 
00066         SetWindowName("Event Display");
00067 
00068         MapSubwindows();
00069         Resize();
00070         MapRaised();
00071         MapWindow();
00072     }

00074     bool EventDisplay::SetFile(const char* file) {
00075 
00076         file_ = TFile::Open(file);
00077 
00078         if (!file_) {
00079             std::cout << std::endl;
00080             std::cout << "Input root file cannot be opened." << std::endl;
00081             return false;
00082         }
00083 
00084         tree_ = (TTree*) file_->Get("LDMX_Events");
00085 
00086         if (!tree_) {
00087             std::cout << std::endl;
00088             std::cout << "Input file contains no tree \"LDMX_Events\"" << std::endl;
00089             return false;
00090         }
00091         eventNumMax_ = tree_->GetEntriesFast();
00092 
00093         ecalDigis_ = new TClonesArray("ldmx::EcalHit");
00094         recoilHits_ = new TClonesArray("ldmx::SimTrackerHit");
00095 
00096         return true;
00097     }
00098 
00099     void EventDisplay::PreviousEvent() {
00100         GotoEvent(eventNum_ - 1);
00101     }
00102 
00103     void EventDisplay::NextEvent() {
00104         GotoEvent(eventNum_ + 1);
00105     }
00106 
00107     bool EventDisplay::GotoEvent(int event) {
00108 
00109         gEve->GetCurrentEvent()->DestroyElements();
00110 
00111         if (event > eventNumMax_ || event < 0) {
00112             std::cout << "Event number out of range." << std::endl;
00113             return false;
00114         }
00115         eventNum_ = event;
00116 
00117         printf("Loading event %d.\n", eventNum_);
00118 
00119         if (hits_) {
00120             hits_ = new TEveElementList("Reco Hits");
00121             hits_->IncDenyDestroy();
00122         }
00123         else {
00124             hits_->DestroyElements();
00125         }
00126         tree_->GetEntry(eventNum_);
00127         tree_->SetBranchAddress("ecalDigis_recon", &ecalDigis_);
00128         tree_->SetBranchAddress("RecoilSimHits_sim", &recoilHits_);
00129         TEveElement* ecalHitSet = drawECALHits(ecalDigis_);
00130         TEveElement* recoilHitSet = drawRecoilHits(recoilHits_);
00131 
00132         hits_->AddElement(ecalHitSet);
00133         hits_->AddElement(recoilHitSet);
00134         gEve->AddElement(hits_);
00135 
00136         gEve->Redraw3D(kFALSE);
00137 
00138         return true;
00139     }
00140 
00141     bool EventDisplay::GotoEvent() {
00142 
00143         int event = atoi(textBox_->GetText());
00144         if (event == 0 && textBox_->GetText() != "0") {
00145             std::cout << "Event number must be a positive integer!" << std::endl;
00146             return false;
00147         }
00148         GotoEvent(event);
00149         return true;
00150     }

00152     TEveStraightLineSet* EventDisplay::drawHexColumn(Double_t xCenter, Double_t yCenter, Double_t frontZ, Double_t backZ, Double_t h, Int_t color, const char* colName) {
00153 
00154         TEveStraightLineSet* lineset = new TEveStraightLineSet(colName);
00155         // Add the bins
00156         Double_t x[6], y[6];
00157         Double_t sqrt_three = sqrt(3);
00158         Double_t a = h / sqrt_three;
00159         Double_t xstart = xCenter - a;
00160         Double_t ystart = yCenter;
00161 
00162         // Go around the hexagon
00163         x[0] = xstart;
00164         y[0] = ystart;
00165         x[1] = x[0] + a / 2.0;
00166         y[1] = y[0] + a * sqrt_three / 2.0;
00167         x[2] = x[1] + a;
00168         y[2] = y[1];
00169         x[3] = x[2] + a / 2.0;
00170         y[3] = y[1] - a * sqrt_three / 2.0;
00171         x[4] = x[2];
00172         y[4] = y[3] - a * sqrt_three / 2.0;
00173         x[5] = x[1];
00174         y[5] = y[4];
00175 
00176         for (int nline = 0; nline < 6; ++nline) {
00177 
00178             int nextpt = nline+1;
00179             if (nline == 5) {
00180                 nextpt = 0;
00181             }
00182 
00183             lineset->AddLine(x[nline], y[nline], frontZ, x[nextpt], y[nextpt], frontZ);
00184             lineset->AddLine(x[nline], y[nline], backZ, x[nextpt], y[nextpt], backZ);
00185             lineset->AddLine(x[nline], y[nline], frontZ, x[nline], y[nline], backZ);
00186         }
00187 
00188         lineset->SetLineColor(color);
00189         return lineset;
00190     }
00191 
00192     TEveBox* EventDisplay::drawBox(Float_t xPos, Float_t yPos, Float_t frontZ, Float_t xWidth, Float_t yWidth, Float_t backZ, Float_t zRotateAngle, Int_t lineColor, Int_t transparency, const char* name) {
00193 
00194         TEveBox *box = new TEveBox(name);
00195 
00196         Float_t vs[8][3] = {
00197                 {xPos-xWidth/2,  yPos-yWidth/2,  frontZ},
00198                 {xPos+xWidth/2,  yPos-yWidth/2,  frontZ},
00199                 {xPos+xWidth/2,  yPos+yWidth/2,  frontZ},
00200                 {xPos-xWidth/2,  yPos+yWidth/2,  frontZ},
00201                 {xPos-xWidth/2,  yPos+yWidth/2,  backZ},
00202                 {xPos+xWidth/2,  yPos+yWidth/2,  backZ},
00203                 {xPos+xWidth/2,  yPos-yWidth/2,  backZ},
00204                 {xPos-xWidth/2,  yPos-yWidth/2,  backZ}
00205         };
00206 
00207         Float_t rotatedvs[8][3];
00208 
00209         for (int m = 0; m < 8; ++m) {
00210 
00211             TVector3 rotatedVec = {vs[m][0],vs[m][1],vs[m][2]};
00212             rotatedVec.RotateZ(zRotateAngle);
00213             rotatedvs[m][0] = rotatedVec[0];
00214             rotatedvs[m][1] = rotatedVec[1];
00215             rotatedvs[m][2] = rotatedVec[2];
00216         }
00217 
00218         box->SetVertices(*rotatedvs);
00219         box->SetLineColor(lineColor);
00220         box->SetMainTransparency(transparency);
00221 
00222         return box;
00223     }
00224 
00225     TEveElement* EventDisplay::drawECAL() {
00226 
00227         TEveElement* ecal = new TEveElementList("ECAL");
00228 
00229         static const std::vector<double> xPos = {0, 0, 0, 170*sqrt(3)/2, -170*sqrt(3)/2, -170*sqrt(3)/2, 170*sqrt(3)/2};
00230         static const std::vector<double> yPos = {0, 170, -170, 85, 85, -85, -85};
00231         static const std::vector<double> zPos = {-252.75, 246.75};
00232 
00233         for (int col = 0; col < xPos.size(); ++col) {
00234 
00235             char colName[50];
00236             sprintf(colName, "Tower %d", col);
00237             TEveStraightLineSet* hexCol = drawHexColumn(xPos[col], yPos[col], zPos[0]+ECAL_Z_OFFSET, zPos[1]+ECAL_Z_OFFSET, 170, kCyan, colName);
00238             ecal->AddElement(hexCol);
00239         }
00240 
00241         return ecal;
00242     }

00244     TEveElement* EventDisplay::drawECALHits(TClonesArray* hits) {
00245         static const double layerZPos[] = {-250.5,-237.75,-225.0,-212.25,-199.5,-186.75,-174.0,-161.25,-148.5,-135.75,-123.0,-110.25,-97.5,-84.75,-72.0,-59.25,-46.5,-33.75,-21.0,-8.25,4.5,17.25,30.0,    42.75,55.5,68.25,81.0,93.75,106.5,119.25,132.0,144.75,157.5,170.25,183.0,195.75,208.5,221.25,234.0,246.75};
00246 
00247         ldmx::EcalHexReadout hex;
00248         ldmx::EcalDetectorID detID;
00249 
00250         double edepMax = 0.0;
00251         ldmx::EcalHit* hit;
00252 
00253         for (TIter next(hits); hit = (ldmx::EcalHit*)next();) {
00254 
00255             if (hit->getEnergy() > edepMax) {
00256 
00257                 edepMax = hit->getEnergy();
00258             }
00259         }
00260 
00261         TEveRGBAPalette* palette = new TEveRGBAPalette(0,edepMax);
00262         TEveBoxSet* ecalHitSet = new TEveBoxSet("ECAL Hits");
00263         ecalHitSet->SetPalette(palette);
00264         ecalHitSet->Reset(TEveBoxSet::kBT_AABox, kFALSE, 64);
00265 
00266         for (TIter next(hits); hit = (ldmx::EcalHit*)next();) {
00267 
00268             double energy = hit->getEnergy();
00269             detID.setRawValue(hit->getID());
00270             detID.unpack();
00271             int layer = detID.getFieldValue("layer");
00272             std::pair<float, float> xyPos = hex.getCellCentroidXYPair(detID.getFieldValue("cell"));
00273 
00274             ecalHitSet->AddBox(xyPos.first, xyPos.second, layerZPos[layer-1]+ECAL_Z_OFFSET, 3, 3, 3);
00275             ecalHitSet->DigitValue(energy);
00276         }
00277 
00278         ecalHitSet->SetPickable(1);
00279         ecalHitSet->SetAlwaysSecSelect(1);
00280         return ecalHitSet;
00281     }
00282 
00283     TEveElement* EventDisplay::drawRecoilHits(TClonesArray* hits) {
00284 
00285         // In mm
00286         static const double stereo_strip_length = 98; // 2 mm deadspace
00287         static const double mono_strip_length = 78; // 2 mm deadspace
00288 
00289         ldmx::SimTrackerHit* hit;
00290         TEveElement* recoilHitSet = new TEveElementList("Recoil Hits");
00291 
00292         for (TIter next(hits); hit = (ldmx::SimTrackerHit*)next();) {
00293 
00294             std::vector<float> xyzPos = hit->getPosition();
00295 
00296             if ((xyzPos[2] > 4 && xyzPos[2] < 5) || (xyzPos[2] > 19 && xyzPos[2] < 20) || (xyzPos[2] > 34 && xyzPos[2] < 35) || (xyzPos[2] > 49 && xyzPos[2] < 50)) {
00297 
00298                 TEveBox *recoilHit = drawBox(xyzPos[0], 0, xyzPos[2], 1, stereo_strip_length, xyzPos[2]+RECOIL_SENSOR_THICKNESS, 0, kYellow, 0, "Recoil Hit");
00299                 recoilHitSet->AddElement(recoilHit);
00300 
00301             } else if ((xyzPos[2] > 10 && xyzPos[2] < 11) || (xyzPos[2] > 40 && xyzPos[2] < 41)) {
00302 
00303                 TVector3 rotPos = {xyzPos[0], xyzPos[1], xyzPos[2]};
00304                 rotPos.RotateZ(-STEREO_ANGLE);
00305 
00306                 TEveBox *recoilHit = drawBox(rotPos[0], 0, xyzPos[2], 1, stereo_strip_length, xyzPos[2]+RECOIL_SENSOR_THICKNESS, STEREO_ANGLE, kYellow, 0, "Recoil Hit");
00307                 recoilHitSet->AddElement(recoilHit);
00308 
00309             } else if ((xyzPos[2] > 25 && xyzPos[2] < 26) || (xyzPos[2] > 55 && xyzPos[2] < 56)) {
00310 
00311                 TVector3 rotPos = {xyzPos[0], xyzPos[1], xyzPos[2]};
00312                 rotPos.RotateZ(STEREO_ANGLE);
00313 
00314                 TEveBox *recoilHit = drawBox(rotPos[0], 0, xyzPos[2], 1, stereo_strip_length, xyzPos[2]+RECOIL_SENSOR_THICKNESS, -STEREO_ANGLE, kYellow, 0, "Recoil Hit");
00315                 recoilHitSet->AddElement(recoilHit);
00316 
00317             } else if (xyzPos[2] > 65) {
00318                 if (fabs(xyzPos[1]) > 1.0) { // dead region
00319 
00320                     if (xyzPos[1] > 0) {
00321 
00322                         TEveBox *recoilHit = drawBox(xyzPos[0], mono_strip_length/2+1, xyzPos[2], 1, mono_strip_length, xyzPos[2]+RECOIL_SENSOR_THICKNESS, 0, kYellow, 0, "Recoil Hit");
00323                         recoilHitSet->AddElement(recoilHit);
00324                     } else {
00325 
00326                         TEveBox *recoilHit = drawBox(xyzPos[0], -mono_strip_length/2-1, xyzPos[2], 1, mono_strip_length, xyzPos[2]+RECOIL_SENSOR_THICKNESS, 0, kYellow, 0, "Recoil Hit");
00327                         recoilHitSet->AddElement(recoilHit);
00328                     }
00329                 }
00330             }
00331         }
00332 
00333         return recoilHitSet;
00334     }
00335 
00336     TEveElement* EventDisplay::drawRecoilTracker() {
00337 
00338         // In mm
00339         static const double stereo_x_width = 40.34;
00340         static const double stereo_y_width = 100;
00341         static const double mono_x_width = 50;
00342         static const double mono_y_width = 80;
00343 
00344         const std::vector<double> xPos = {-2*mono_x_width, -mono_x_width, 0, mono_x_width, 2*mono_x_width};
00345         const std::vector<double> yPos = {-mono_y_width/2, mono_y_width/2};
00346         const std::vector<double> zPos = {7.5, 22.5, 37.5, 52.5, 90.0, 180.0};
00347 
00348         TEveElement* recoilTracker = new TEveElementList("Recoil Tracker");
00349         for (int j = 0; j < 4; ++j) {
00350 
00351             char nfront[50];
00352             sprintf(nfront, "Stereo%d_front", j+1);
00353 
00354             char nback[50];
00355             sprintf(nback, "Stereo%d_back", j+1);
00356 
00357             TEveBox *front = drawBox(0, 0, zPos[j]-STEREO_SEP, stereo_x_width, stereo_y_width, zPos[j]-STEREO_SEP+RECOIL_SENSOR_THICKNESS, 0, kCyan, 100, nfront);
00358 
00359             if (j % 2 == 0) { // Alternate angle for back layer of a stereo pair.
00360                 TEveBox *back = drawBox(0, 0, zPos[j]+STEREO_SEP, stereo_x_width, stereo_y_width, zPos[j]+STEREO_SEP+RECOIL_SENSOR_THICKNESS, STEREO_ANGLE, kCyan, 100, nback);
00361                 recoilTracker->AddElement(back);
00362             } else {
00363                 TEveBox *back = drawBox(0, 0, zPos[j]+STEREO_SEP, stereo_x_width, stereo_y_width, zPos[j]+STEREO_SEP+RECOIL_SENSOR_THICKNESS, -STEREO_ANGLE, kCyan, 100, nback);
00364                 recoilTracker->AddElement(back);
00365             }
00366 
00367             recoilTracker->AddElement(front);
00368         }
00369 
00370         int module1 = 1;
00371         for (int x = 0; x < 5; ++x) {
00372             for (int y = 0; y < 2; ++y) {
00373 
00374                 char name[50];
00375                 sprintf(name,"Mono1_%d",module1);
00376                 ++module1;
00377 
00378                 if (x % 2 != 0) { // Alternate mono layer z by defined separation.
00379                     TEveBox *front = drawBox(xPos[x], yPos[y], zPos[4]-MONO_SEP, mono_x_width, mono_y_width, zPos[4]-MONO_SEP+RECOIL_SENSOR_THICKNESS, 0, kCyan, 100, name);
00380                     recoilTracker->AddElement(front);
00381                 } else {
00382                     TEveBox *back = drawBox(xPos[x], yPos[y], zPos[4]+MONO_SEP, mono_x_width, mono_y_width, zPos[4]+MONO_SEP+RECOIL_SENSOR_THICKNESS, 0, kCyan, 100, name);
00383                     recoilTracker->AddElement(back);
00384                 }
00385             }
00386         }
00387 
00388         int module2 = 1;
00389         for (int x = 0; x < 5; ++x) {
00390             for (int y = 0; y < 2; ++y) {
00391 
00392                 char name[50];
00393                 sprintf(name,"Mono2_%d",module2);
00394                 module2++;
00395 
00396                 if (x % 2 != 0) { // Alternate mono layer z by defined separation.
00397                     TEveBox *front = drawBox(xPos[x], yPos[y], zPos[5]-MONO_SEP, mono_x_width, mono_y_width, zPos[5]-MONO_SEP+RECOIL_SENSOR_THICKNESS, 0, kCyan, 100, name);
00398                     recoilTracker->AddElement(front);
00399                 } else {
00400                     TEveBox *back = drawBox(xPos[x], yPos[y], zPos[5]+MONO_SEP, mono_x_width, mono_y_width, zPos[5]+MONO_SEP+RECOIL_SENSOR_THICKNESS, 0, kCyan, 100, name);
00401                     recoilTracker->AddElement(back);
00402                 }
00403             }
00404         }
00405 
00406         return recoilTracker;
00407     }
